docTitle.titlePart:
Interpretation der Absorptionsspektren von Aza- und
Azinium-substituierten Anthracenen

titlePage.byline: Lumineszenz-Forechungsgruppe, Institut fur Physik der Universität Gdansk, Polen
titlePage.note: The Interpretation of Absorption Spectra of Aza- and Azinium-Substituted Anthracenes

front.div:
The absorption spectra of the 3 isomeric aza- and the 4 isomeric azinium-anthraoenes are dis-
cussed on the basis of the absorption anisotropy, the oscillator strenght and the fluorescence
decay times. The influence of endocyclic substitution depends on the position of the aza- and
azininrngroup, respectively. In the case of acridine, acridinium» benzo[g]quinolinium and benzoff]-
isoquinolinium the So -> Sa-transition is observable. The spectra of benzo[g]quinoline, benzo[f)*
isoquinoline and acridizinium are similar to those of anthracene.
